content: Stacey, despite having years of experience and a passion for technology, lacked the confidence to advance her career.
Google Career Certificates can help individuals expand their skill set and gain confidence for career advancement.

Google Career Certificates are lessons designed to prepare individuals for entry-level roles in fields such as cybersecurity, data analytics, digital marketing & e-commerce, IT support, project management, or user experience (UX) design.
Google Career Certificates equip learners with skills for over 2.4 million in-demand jobs, which have a median salary exceeding $76,000.
